Text: VaRdelta and Watershed technologiesFEA has arrived at a very simple direct and inexpensive approach to licensing our two VaRrelated patents as a package I hope that you will agree that our proposed license fee of plus per employee with licenses to go to all of your affiliates would be an attractive offer I would love to sign up Enron for this package as an early customer Do you think you could forward the attached pdf license agreement to the appropriate people at Enron together with your recommendation I am highly motivated to get Enron as a licensee and I strongly believe that it will be a worthwhile effort for both parties Best regards Mark B Garman President Financial Engineering Associates Inc Shattuck Avenue Suite Berkeley CA Tel Fax Microsoft Word patentlicpdf
